=Features=

  * Type-safe access to configuration key/value pairs
  * Check for mandatory property values
  * Automatic substitution (resolve) of expressions of the form ${my.key} inside config values
  * Subset features

=Requisites=

  * Java 1.6+

Maven users just need to add the following dependency, it will download the required libraries automatically:

{{{
  <dependency>
    <groupId>com.purej</groupId>
    <artifactId>purej-cfg</artifactId>
    <version>1.0</version>
  </dependency>
}}}
